name: FLICK THE BOX up the ladder
name_original: FLICK THE BOX up the ladder
description:
FLICK THE BOX Up The Ladder

Every time you click, you move up a rung and get money!  You can spend that money to make the coins worth more money or have the game just click for you! 

Game features a collection of public domain music. 

Options menu includes volume option for the music and sound effects in the game.  Options menu also will turn off the ladder visuals.  

Your progress in the game is saved, so you can quit and come back to it later.  Or leave it running in the background for those sweet auto clicks! 

The Web Build of the game is only a Demo.  The web version does not save and has no music! I highly recommend you download the Unity build for the game instead!  Then you can save your progress, quit the game and come back later!
